item.title: Two parts of a bed base left on the pavement, 8th September
item.description:
Two large parts of a bed base have been left on the pavement outside Our Lady of Lourdes School. School children walk past and they are an obstruction which needs to be cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, The Limes Avenue, New Southgate, London

item.title: 2 large heaps of topsoil in Park at the rear of 69 Kings Hall Road, 8th September
item.description:
Two large heaps of topsoil have been put in the park. These are associated with building work being carried out at the bottom of the garden to number 69 Kings Hall Road, Beckenham. ( I have observed them doing this with mini diggers). They have also had building materials delivered to the park entrance in Aldersmead Road for delivery via the park. Vehicle tracks are visible in the grass to the right of the park entrance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aldersmead Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several fly tips along anerley park, 8th September
item.description:
There is clearly a company / companies offering domestic waste collection and dumping items along anerley park. This seems to go undeterred by Bromley council. Instead of cleaning up after them retrospectively why canâ€™t proactive measures be put in place to try and catch the criminals? The whole of the SE20 post code is basically decriminalised when it comes to industrial fly tipping, dog waste and anti social behaviour
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Park, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown and dirty trees in front of the house, 8th September
item.description:

item.title: All along Kilburn High Road, 8th September
